snippet.title: PSX Longplay [053] Beatmania
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org/

Played By: Deskawa

This game has some historic relevance since it's the second music game ever (first one is Parappa the rapper), and the first one to have this kind of gameplay which is very succesful nowadays in the japanese arcades and in the actual consoles with Guitar Hero and the others. This game anyway contains Beatmania 2nd Mix (the sequel to the original Beatmania in arcades, but this version also has some songs from the first one as far as I know) and Yebisu mix as an add on which has slighly better music and graphics.

The game is structured in four stages you have to beat to finish the game, but here I did each song for each stage, so don't be confused. First stage's music isn't too good for some reason, so don't let it discourage you:

Beatmania 2nd Mix

First stage:

02:37 U gotta groove

04:09 Jam jam reggae

05:33 Beginning of life

7:05 Jam jam reggae (FUNKY jam Cookie mix)

Second stage:

8:58 2 gorgeous 4 U

10:24 Do you love me?

11:57 Overdoser

13:24 U gotta groove (Triple Mazin Dub)

15:02 Tokai

Third stage:

17:01 DJ BATTLE

18:07 20, november (single mix)

Fourth stage:

19:49 Love so groovy

21:28 e-motion

22:55 Love so groovy (Nite's After Luv mix)

24:31 Deep clear eyes

26:10 Acid Bomb

27:46 Overdoser (Driving Dub mix)

29:22 Salamander Beat Crush mix

31:00 e-motion (2nd mix)

32:36 SKA a gogo (yeeeeeeeeeek)

And now the songs from Yebisu Mix

37:04 Cat song ~ Theme of UPA

38:55 Changing the Asia

40:59 Papayapa Bossa

42:52 Body

44:30 Ain't it Good

46:02 Stop Violence!

47:45 I.C.B.

49:28 Metal Gear Solid ~ Main theme

51:21 La Bossanova de Fabbiene -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
